title: Update Hero section logo with uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre image

requirements.text: Replace the current logo in the Hero component with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo image (Brilliant Coaching Centre copy (1).jpg) showing a lightbulb design with yellow student figure and the text 'brilliant COACHING CENTRE' in gold/yellow on dark background with maroon border
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero component displays the uploaded logo image
The logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
The logo is visually consistent with the existing gold/yellow and maroon branding
The logo is appropriately sized for both desktop and mobile viewports

requirements.text: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and update the Hero component to reference this asset path
acceptanceCriteria: The logo file is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
The Hero component references the correct asset path
The image loads correctly when the application runs
No broken image links or 404 errors occur

constraints: Do not modify the immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain the existing gold/yellow text, dark background, and maroon accent color scheme
Preserve bilingual support (English and Bengali) for all text content
Keep the existing Hero component structure and functionality intact
nonGoals: Redesigning the Hero section layout or structure
Modifying other sections of the website
Changing the color scheme or branding
Adding new features to the Hero component beyond logo replacement
